text: The flag of Vietnam, officially "red flag with a gold star" (cờ đỏ sao vàng), was designed in 1940. The background color is red and there is a yellow star. Red means revolution and victory while the yellow star means leadership of Communist Party of Vietnam. The star also means different grades of Vietnam. "Nguyễn Hữu Tiến hay Lê Quang Sô? ", Tuổi Trẻ, Nov. 23, 2006. == References == Vietnam Category:Symbols of Vietnam
title: Flag of Vietnam
